message: I ask because a few friends are into this new Rift thing and ... well I'm trying really hard not to start another MMO.
But they're saying it's really good!

They say that about drugs too, but I'll bet you don't want to end up living in a trailer park, barely able to string a setence together and getting angry for no good reason. That's what MMOs will do to you!
"barely able to string a setence together", huh?
See, and I only played WoW for a couple of months.
